sentences.en: Inside Saint - Sulpice , Silas carried heavy iron votive candle holder from the altar back toward the obelisk.
sentences.cn: 圣叙尔皮斯教堂中, 塞拉斯从圣坛上取下烛台,走回方尖碑前.

sentences.en: The only verdict is vengeance a vendetta held as a votive not in vain.
sentences.cn: 唯一的结论就是复仇一种仇恨作为一种虚无的奉献.

sentences.en: Treasure was buried for many reasons: to keep it out of enemy hands, to "bank" a fortune, to serve as a votive offering.
sentences.cn: 一般来说，埋藏财宝有这样几个原因：让财宝远离敌人；为了储藏财富；作为宗教上的布施与贡献。

sentences.en: V : The only verdict is vengeance, a vendetta, held as a votive not in vain.
sentences.cn: 唯一的结论就是复仇, 一种仇恨, 作为一种虚无的奉献.

sentences.en: Votive candle , placed in a clear glass candle holder is safer and will actually last longer.
sentences.cn: 在玻璃灯盏中放上蜡烛可以让它燃烧得更久,也更安全.

words.tran_cn: 奉献的（副词votively）；献纳的；诚心祈求的

trans.tran_en: offered, given, undertaken, performed or dedicated in fulfilment of or in accordance with a vow
